name: Kore.ai
pricing: Session-based, usage-based, and per-seat pricing models; volume discounts for larger deployments.
description: Kore.ai provides an enterprise-grade platform for building, deploying, and managing AI agents across various applications, with a strong focus on governance and observability.
reason: Enterprise leader with Fortune 500 clients and a strong focus on AI governance.

name: FlowHunt
pricing: Free tier available; Pro plans starting at $29/month.
description: A no-code AI agent building platform that enables organizations to create, deploy, and manage agents seamlessly across various applications.
reason: Innovative no-code approach democratizing agent development with a drag-and-drop interface.

name: CapSolver
description: Provides a robust API for handling web challenges, enabling AI agents to navigate websites and perform automated tasks successfully.
reason: Strong technical capabilities with advanced reasoning for web navigation.

name: Relevance AI
description: Offers a no-code platform for building AI agents focused on rapid development and deployment, featuring extensive integrations with business applications.
reason: Rapid development and deployment capabilities with extensive integrations.

name: Microsoft Copilot Studio
pricing: Subscription required; pricing varies by organization.
description: Integrates AI capabilities within the Microsoft ecosystem, allowing users to build agents that optimize productivity across Microsoft applications.
reason: Enterprise readiness with deep integration into Microsoftâ€™s productivity tools.

name: Google Vertex AI
description: A comprehensive platform for building, training, and deploying scalable AI agents, integrated with Google Cloud services for enhanced capabilities.
reason: Robust infrastructure for production deployment with multimodal processing capabilities.

name: Zapier Central
description: Leverages extensive integration ecosystem to create intelligent agents that automate workflows across thousands of applications.
reason: Connects to over 7,000 applications, enabling automation of complex workflows.

name: Machine Learning Mastery
description: Discusses emerging trends in agentic AI, highlighting the shift from prototypes to production-ready systems.
reason: Provides insights on the future of agentic AI and key trends shaping the industry.

name: MIT Sloan
description: Discusses the emergence of autonomous agents capable of acting on behalf of users, emphasizing the need for businesses to adapt.
reason: Highlights critical insights into the adaptation of platforms for agentic AI.

pricing: Free tier available; Pro plans starting at $29/month.
description: Documentation for building and managing agents on the FlowHunt platform.
reason: Provides comprehensive resources for users to effectively leverage agent capabilities.

reason: Offers extensive documentation to support enterprise-grade AI agent development.

name: Google Cloud AI
description: A suite of AI and machine learning services to build and deploy intelligent applications.
reason: Comprehensive tools and services for AI applications with enterprise support.

name: IBM Watson
description: Offers various AI tools and services, including natural language processing and machine learning capabilities.
reason: Established enterprise leader with a wide range of AI solutions.

name: OpenAI API
description: Provides access to powerful AI language models for building intelligent applications.
reason: Access to cutting-edge AI language models enabling innovative applications.

name: Haystack
